mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Student WHERE studentId = #{studentId} AND activeInd!=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT( studentPersonId, registerNumber, admissionNumber, studentAddressId, createdDate, updatedDate, activeInd) VALUES(#{studentPersonId}, #{registerNumber}, #{admissionNumber}, #{studentAddressId}, current_date, #{updatedDate}, #{activeInd})
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT SET admissionNumber = #{admissionNumber}, registerNumber = #{registerNumber}, updatedDate = current_date WHERE studentId=#{studentId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE STUDENT SET updatedDate=current_date,activeInd=0 WHERE studentId = #{studentId}
